description.@en: This will halt decomposition but for a short while, until we can revivify the subject.

effect.@en:
Create Preservation Fluid: Depending on where you’re at on the Damage Condition Track, the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Unharmed: (Easy +20%) Alchemy

Hurt: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Moderately Wounded: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Seriously Wounded: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Grievously Wounded: (Hard -20%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of vials for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One vial

[IB] 7 to 12: Two vials

[IB] 13+: Three vials

criticalSuccess.@en: You create Three vials of Preservation Fluid.

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory and hemlock. Once a vial of Preservation Fluid is poured onto a corpse or plant, it completely halts decay for one week.to an alchemical laboratory, arsenic and one of the following: opium (for Laudanum or Tincture) or salt (for Smelling salts). You must also have opium to create Laudanum, salt to create Smelling salts or quicksilver to create Tincture.
